properties.Name: OfferOfEmployment

Columns.Name: ContractId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Contract.

Columns.Name: OfferDate
Columns.Description: The date that the offer is extended.

Columns.Name: EmployeeLocationId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Location.

Columns.Name: TitleOfPosition
Columns.Description: The title of the position being offered.

Columns.Name: DescriptionOfPosition
Columns.Description: A description of the position being offered.

Columns.Name: JobStartDate
Columns.Description: The date that the job will start.

Columns.Name: JobPayRate
Columns.Description: The rate of pay for the position.

Columns.Name: DateOfferExpires
Columns.Description: The date that the offer to prospective employee expires.

Columns.Name: EmployerRepresentativeName
Columns.Description: The name of the employer representative extending the job offer to the prospective employee.
